SANGS RGYAS 'DREN PA MTHONG, ,SGO BAS

BSAMS PA, DA DUNG NGAS SNYING RJE BSGOM PA MTHAR MA PHYIN PAS

CHE BA DPA' ZHING STER PHOD PA YIN PA LA,

KHONG MI CHE BAS SUS KYANG SLONG MI NUS, KHYED RANG RNAMS PHYIN

RNAMS LA PHYAG DBANG DANG,

BYINGS LA ZHAL MJAL STZAL, NAGS SHOD RAB (174 BA) BRTAN BLA
